title: Sell Hart Brothers Whisky
metaTitle: Sell Hart Brothers Whisky | Finest Collection | Proof Cellars
metaDescription: Sell your Hart Brothers whisky. We buy the Finest Collection (Black Label), Littlemill, and aged single casks.
heroSubhead: Direct buyer for Hart Brothers Finest Collection.
introParagraph: Hart Brothers, with origins as licensed victuallers, bottle superb single malts. Their 'Finest Collection' (often black labels or tubes) includes legendary Littlemill exclusives.
conditionFactors: Tube: The silver/black tubes are prone to denting.
Littlemill: Any Hart Brothers Littlemill is a gold mine. Check label condition carefully.
Fill: Older bottlings (80s/90s) check neck level.
pricingFactors: Distillery: Hart Brothers is synonymous with Littlemill (closed distillery). These trade highest.
Series: The older 'Finest Collection' label is preferred over modern ones.

faqs.question: Why is Littlemill so valuable?
faqs.answer: It is a closed distillery (demolished). Hart Bros had incredible access to their casks.

faqs.question: Do you buy the 17 Year Old range?
faqs.answer: Yes, especially the sherry finished ones.

faqs.question: Do you buy 'Legends'?
faqs.answer: Yes, the Legends series (e.g. 1965 Glenfarclas) is high value.

faqs.question: How do I date the bottle?
faqs.answer: Look for the distillation month/year on the label.
